Dungeon World

I'm working on prepping a standardized version of these html files for public distribution, so I am stripping all proprietary content, hence the change in appearance. If you encounter any issues with styling or functionality please use the contact link above to let me know. Thanks.

I also noticed that I was using the abbreviated moves text, not the full text from the book so that was added. I also noticed the example of play was missing from the navigation so that was added back in. If you have a chance please compare these texts to the book to make sure everything and says the same thing.

-Jeffrey
